A SolidBody that is also subject to gravity.

Functions
SolidMass
public SolidMass()

Instanciates a default SolidMass behavior.

The acceleration due to gravity is by default set to ~ -9.81 m/s².

Unit: m/s² (default = -9.80665)

(default = 0.4)

Multiplied to the speed when bouncing (default = 0)
